name: Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary data bundle
description: This dataset contains geospatial data delimiting the Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary as well as information on their management, governing policies, human activities, and other relevant data.
license: This work is licensed under a  Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License
citation: Any citations of other CreativeWorks that are relevant to or qualify this one

variableMeasured.name: Level of fishing protection
variableMeasured.propertyID: PID/URI to a controlled vocabulary term or similar describing this variable
variableMeasured.description: This variable uses a 1 through 5 categorial/ordinal scale to express the level of restriction (5 being the most restricted) on fishing activity in the protected area
variableMeasured.measurementTechnique: URLtoMethodology or text describing method of determination

variableMeasured.name: Bottom trawling status
variableMeasured.propertyID: PID/URI to a controlled vocabulary term or similar describing this variable
variableMeasured.description: The levels of this categorical variable indicate whether bottom trawling is allowed (0), restricted(1), prohibited (2), or if the status is unknown or does not apply (3)

variableMeasured.name: Discharge status
variableMeasured.propertyID: PID/URI to a controlled vocabulary term or similar describing this variable
variableMeasured.description: The levels of this categorical variable indicate whether discharge from vessels is allowed (0), restricted(1), prohibited (2), or if the status is unknown or does not apply (3)

variableMeasured.name: Speed restricted
variableMeasured.propertyID: PID/URI to a controlled vocabulary term or similar describing this variable
variableMeasured.description: The levels of this categorical variable indicate whether vessel speed is unrestricted (0), restricted(1), or if the status is unknown or does not apply (3)

variableMeasured.name: Entry restricted
variableMeasured.propertyID: PID/URI to a controlled vocabulary term or similar describing this variable
variableMeasured.description: The levels of this categorical variable indicate whether vessel entry into the area is allowed (0), restricted(1), prohibited (2), or if the status is unknown or does not apply (3)

variableMeasured.name: Diving restricted
variableMeasured.propertyID: PID/URI to a controlled vocabulary term or similar describing this variable
variableMeasured.description: The levels of this categorical variable indicate whether scuba diving in the area is allowed (0), restricted(1), prohibited (2), or if the status is unknown or does not apply (3)

variableMeasured.name: Removal of historic artifacts restricted

variableMeasured.description: The levels of this categorical variable indicate whether removal of historic artifacts from the area is allowed (0), restricted(1), prohibited (2), or if the status is unknown or does not apply (3)

publishingPrinciples.name: NOAA MPA Center MPA Inventory
publishingPrinciples.description: This dataset was generated in partnership with the NOAA MPA Center as an extension of the U.S. MPA inventory.
